H0.text: Beaufort who created The Wind Scale had which profession . Meteorologist

H1.text: Beaufort who created The Wind Scale had which profession . Engineer

H2.text: Beaufort who created The Wind Scale had which profession . Physicist

H3.text: Beaufort who created The Wind Scale had which profession . Sailor

A4.text: Beaufort persuaded the Board of Trade to set up a Meterorological Department, Fitzroy became its first director.

A5.text: Beaufort was an Irish hydrographer and naval officer.

A6.text: Francis Beaufort was serving on HMS Woolwich while devising the scale.
